QuestData.Title: Words Have Power
QuestData.Description: The Stoneborn Rebels have left behind recruitment pamphlets. Recovering these for the venthyr may earn some much needed favor.
QuestData.RewardText:
Ugh, vile things. Give them to me and I will see them properly disposed of.
Here, for your troubles. Perhaps this reward will help wipe the filth of these documents from your fingertips.
